featured.text: Which of the following is located at the edge of a body of water?
In this way, these secret shoppers may help a business gain a competitive edge.
An eye stye is a small bump, resembling a pimple, that develops when an oil gland at the edge of an eyelid becomes infected by bacteria.

definition.en_def: The outermost limit or boundary of something; a position of advantage.
definition.example: She stood at the edge of the cliff, looking out at the ocean.
